titleStmt.title: Amends for ladies VVith the humour of roring. A comedie. As it was acted at the Blacke Fryers, both by the Princes seruants, and the Lady Elizabeths. By Nat. Field.
titleStmt.author: Field, Nathan, 1587-1620?

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by G. Eld, for Math. Walbancke, and are to be sold at his shop, at the new gate of Grayes-Inne, or at the old,

notesStmt.note: Another state (issue?) of STC 10851. The title page is in substantially the same setting.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
